post:
Hi there,

We would like to present you with our Standard **[KVM VPS](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/virtualized-servers-vps/standard-virtualized-servers-vps "KVM VPS")** product line which starts from only **6.95$** per month. our nodes are located in Amsterdam, Lose Angeles, and New York City.

Our base plan features
1 vCore 3.80GHz (shared)
1GiB RAM
25GiB SSD Disk space
1TiB Bandwidth
IPv4 + IPv6
1Gbit port speed (LA & NYC up to 2.5 Gbit port speed)
IPXe Support
Unlimited Reinstalls
Powered by our in-house [Wolfixy ](https://www.xsl.tel/about/wolfixy-control-panel "Wolfixy ") control panel
6.95 (Pro-rated to 1 of each month) use 10PRECENTOFF for a 10% off life-time discount of any plan with monthly billing term.

For more info about our plans [check our website](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/virtualized-servers-vps/standard-virtualized-servers-vps "check our website")

All our products comes with semi-managed and optional full-management support through tickets and LiveChat.

Best regards
Xsltel OU
